entry.title: LN Summit 2024 Organization
entry.summary: The email discusses the additional medical risks and vaccination schedules that come with traveling to the African continent. The sender mentions that attending developer meetings in Africa would require weighing the costs differently, but they do express interest in attending large conferences where they can meet individuals using Bitcoin and developing on top of it. The email is from Antoine Riard and was sent on August 20th, 2023 at 6:40 PM.
